data.what_is:
Marketing automation software for agencies designed with ease-of-use in mind. Deploy new instances in a few clicks, create automation campaigns with our drag-and-drop creator, and get to grips with marketing automation without all the complicated bells and whistles. 

Improve your digital strategies by qualifying, segmenting, and nurturing prospects for your clients; so they only focus on leads that are actually interested, saving their sales teams time and effort.
data.product_description: Webmecanik Automation is a software system that analyses the behaviour of prospects and clients and couples it with data already held in database, it trigger automatic campaigns to nurture relationships with compelling messages using high quality media.Webmecanik's solution is up to four times cheaper than competitors.For the life of a contract with us, customers are assigned a native account manager that never changes.myWebmecanik makes deploying and monitoring extra instances as simple as a few clicks.
data.positioning_against_competitor: Product DescriptionWebmecanik Automation is a software system that analyses the behaviour of prospects and clients and couples it with data already held in database, it trigger automatic campaigns to nurture relationships with compelling messages using high quality media.Webmecanik's solution is up to four times cheaper than competitors.For the life of a contract with us, customers are assigned a native account manager that never changes.myWebmecanik makes deploying and monitoring extra instances as simple as a few clicks.Seller DetailsSellerWebmecanikYear Founded2015HQ LocationAnnecy, FRTwitter@Webmecanik_FR2,964 Twitter followersLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.com29 employees on LinkedIn(r)NPOverview Provided by:Norman Pracht
data.supported_languages: Arabic, Catalan, Czech, German, Greek, English, Persian, Finnish, French, Hebrew, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese, Chinese (Simplified)

pricing_plans.plan_description: Limited database package specifically for small business with all features and functions included
Licence with larger enterprises in mind. All features and functionalities included.
Our most attractive package tailor-made to meet the needs of digital agencies.
plan_features: EUR100 p/ month per new account
EUR50 p/ month for an additional 10,000 contacts

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically This feature was mentioned in 11 Webmecanik Automation reviews.

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending. This feature was mentioned in 11 Webmecanik Automation reviews.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 11 Webmecanik Automation reviews. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 11 Webmecanik Automation reviews. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: As reported in 11 Webmecanik Automation reviews. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: As reported in 10 Webmecanik Automation reviews. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages. 10 reviewers of Webmecanik Automation have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history. This feature was mentioned in 10 Webmecanik Automation reviews.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 11 Webmecanik Automation reviews. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 11 Webmecanik Automation reviews. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives. This feature was mentioned in 10 Webmecanik Automation reviews.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

initial_reviews.review_title: The best way to increase your business profits
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
It allows me to create personalized, automated marketing campaigns, as well as manage my sales team, analyze their performance, keep track of their sales pipelines, store their information in one centralized location, and provide them with leads and opportunities. Also, it helped me to build a better relationship with them.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
It has many positive aspects. And I have not encountered any major issues yet, but I would like to see more customization features in future updates.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
It solved my problem of assigning tasks and setting deadlines, which helped our team to stay on track and avoid missing any deadlines.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
review_question_answers.answer: It allows me to create personalized, automated marketing campaigns, as well as manage my sales team, analyze their performance, keep track of their sales pipelines, store their information in one centralized location, and provide them with leads and opportunities. Also, it helped me to build a better relationship with them.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
review_question_answers.answer: It has many positive aspects. And I have not encountered any major issues yet, but I would like to see more customization features in future updates.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: It solved my problem of assigning tasks and setting deadlines, which helped our team to stay on track and avoid missing any deadlines.

initial_reviews.review_title: An automation tool which can accelerate your business with great speed.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
Almost all the features are best, you cannot ask for more but there are few features I would like to mention are lead generation and management are out of the chart. It can also manage the traffic on the landing page and target the potential customer. Email marketing makes the job easier and saves a lot of time. Its analysis tool help in the adjustment or planning of strategies for the potential customer.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
I faced some problems while integration to different platforms and there is a speed issue sometimes. Else everything is perfectly fine.

Recommendations to others considering Webmecanik Automation:
Initially, I was also a bit suspicious about the product but after using it I realize the importance of it in my business and how beneficial it can be for my business.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Lead generation and management is the main reason of using this product but other features also come handy. As Analytics help in improving the strategies.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
I like its social media features the best. It helps to analyse the different statistics like followers, user engagement more carefully and helps to spread our content further,tehreby generating more leads. Its web development features are also very good and one can create beautiful landing pages with little to no experience in coding.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
Its support for emails is suboptimal and is very confusing. Sometimes,in case of emails ,it fails to alert events too.

Recommendations to others considering Webmecanik Automation:
I would hihgly recommend this software to anyone that primarily uses social media as their main advertisement platform.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is helping us advertise our products better and helping us reach a larger audience in a much more efficient way.

initial_reviews.review_title: An incredible platform that provides marketing automation solution to companies at a low cost.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
Webmecanik Automation offers a wide range of vital features which include Customizable CTAs, Drip Campaigns, Dynamic Content, Landing Pages/Web Forms, Lead Scoring, Social Marketing, Website Visitor Tracking, segmentation and many others. It starting price is 100$ per month which is affordable and cheaper as compared to other softwares of its kind out there. The updates are released constantly and many improvements are made. It contains modern and innovative features which do all the work at a low cost and enhance productivity. The interface is smooth and decent and the user can create amazing web forms with it.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
Webmecanik Automation contains a lot of errors and even though updates are useful they are forced. I do not like the documentation feature and it doesn't integrate with HubSpot which makes it difficult to use for users who use HubSpot. There are a multiple bugs present and it contains no free version or free trial. The email configuration is complex and confusing at first which makes it difficult to use.

Recommendations to others considering Webmecanik Automation:
Webmecanik Automation is an innovative software that I had a positive experience with so it is highly recommended.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Webmecanik Automation is an all in one platform that integrates with other systems effectively and the user can learn how to use it in just few minutes. It is the best software for me and I will keep using it in future.

review_question_answers.answer: Webmecanik Automation offers a wide range of vital features which include Customizable CTAs, Drip Campaigns, Dynamic Content, Landing Pages/Web Forms, Lead Scoring, Social Marketing, Website Visitor Tracking, segmentation and many others. It starting price is 100$ per month which is affordable and cheaper as compared to other softwares of its kind out there. The updates are released constantly and many improvements are made. It contains modern and innovative features which do all the work at a low cost and enhance productivity. The interface is smooth and decent and the user can create amazing web forms with it.

There are a multiple bugs present and it contains no free version or free trial. The email configuration is complex and confusing at first which makes it difficult to use.

initial_reviews.review_title: Webmecanik Automation is a solution for your marketing campaigns in a simple and efficient manner.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
The main thing i like about it is the ease of use. It enhances productivity and while having to spend less amount of money. It helps you decrease the time spent so you can use it for anything other productive and It is the best platform that I have seen so far. You can integrate it to social tools as well and it provides a simple and efficient solution.Tons of features present at one single platform  and The support system is caring and friendly as they respond to your concerns within no time and solve them too. It is a software that works together with your website  and helps your email to get integrated.  Everything is prepared for you and it does all the work for you.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
The learning curve of Webmecanik Automation is steep and it can take some time to learn it properly. There are not much complaints i have from this software. Minor bugs are found but they are present in every system to it is not a big deal.

initial_reviews.review_title: Popular open-source solution with excellent support by webmecanik
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
You get a complete Mautic installation. Everything already setup and ready to go. Webmecaniks support is brilliant, fast and not limited to technical problems only. They also offer great support in all questions and problems regarding marketing automation in general.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
Nothing so far. I think it is important to mention that webmecanik offers mautic as a service. So you may not be able to control every server-side setting. But in all honesty you don't have to because that is what webmecanik does.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation provides you with great tools to plan and realise automated marketing campaigns. With automation it is possible to design campaigns tailored to the needs of different potential customer segments.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
review_question_answers.answer: You get a complete Mautic installation. Everything already setup and ready to go. Webmecaniks support is brilliant, fast and not limited to technical problems only. They also offer great support in all questions and problems regarding marketing automation in general.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
review_question_answers.answer: Nothing so far. I think it is important to mention that webmecanik offers mautic as a service. So you may not be able to control every server-side setting. But in all honesty you don't have to because that is what webmecanik does.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Automation provides you with great tools to plan and realise automated marketing campaigns. With automation it is possible to design campaigns tailored to the needs of different potential customer segments.

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy Marketing Automation for SMB based on open source
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
Webmecanik is simple to setup and easy to use. It is based on the open source Marketing Automation platform Mautic. It is perfect for companies willing to implement a marketing automation software which works together with their current website (eg. on Wordpress). Powerful email integration with Mailjet.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
Social Media integration is just being added to Webmecanik. We need it and wait for it.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Webmecanik developed the "MyWebmecanik" platform allowing agencies to run several clients at one place  (Agency Platform).

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
review_question_answers.answer: Webmecanik is simple to setup and easy to use. It is based on the open source Marketing Automation platform Mautic. It is perfect for companies willing to implement a marketing automation software which works together with their current website (eg. on Wordpress). Powerful email integration with Mailjet.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
review_question_answers.answer: Social Media integration is just being added to Webmecanik. We need it and wait for it.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Webmecanik developed the "MyWebmecanik" platform allowing agencies to run several clients at one place  (Agency Platform).

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Inbound Marketing Strategist, Marketing Consultant, CEO, UX Designer

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?

all_reviews.review_title: The best way to increase your business profits
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
It allows me to create personalized, automated marketing campaigns, as well as manage my sales team, analyze their performance, keep track of their sales pipelines, store their information in one centralized location, and provide them with leads and opportunities. Also, it helped me to build a better relationship with them.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
It has many positive aspects. And I have not encountered any major issues yet, but I would like to see more customization features in future updates.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
It solved my problem of assigning tasks and setting deadlines, which helped our team to stay on track and avoid missing any deadlines.

It can also manage the traffic on the landing page and target the potential customer. Email marketing makes the job easier and saves a lot of time. Its analysis tool help in the adjustment or planning of strategies for the potential customer.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
I faced some problems while integration to different platforms and there is a speed issue sometimes. Else everything is perfectly fine.

Lead generation and management is the main reason of using this product but other features also come handy. As Analytics help in improving the strategies.

all_reviews.review_title: An incredible platform that provides marketing automation solution to companies at a low cost.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
Webmecanik Automation offers a wide range of vital features which include Customizable CTAs, Drip Campaigns, Dynamic Content, Landing Pages/Web Forms, Lead Scoring, Social Marketing, Website Visitor Tracking, segmentation and many others. It starting price is 100$ per month which is affordable and cheaper as compared to other softwares of its kind out there. The updates are released constantly and many improvements are made. It contains modern and innovative features which do all the work at a low cost and enhance productivity. The interface is smooth and decent and the user can create amazing web forms with it.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
Webmecanik Automation contains a lot of errors and even though updates are useful they are forced. I do not like the documentation feature and it doesn't integrate with HubSpot which makes it difficult to use for users who use HubSpot. There are a multiple bugs present and it contains no free version or free trial. The email configuration is complex and confusing at first which makes it difficult to use.

Recommendations to others considering Webmecanik Automation:
Webmecanik Automation is an innovative software that I had a positive experience with so it is highly recommended.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Webmecanik Automation is an all in one platform that integrates with other systems effectively and the user can learn how to use it in just few minutes. It is the best software for me and I will keep using it in future.

It starting price is 100$ per month which is affordable and cheaper as compared to other softwares of its kind out there. The updates are released constantly and many improvements are made. all_reviews.review_title: Webmecanik Automation is a solution for your marketing campaigns in a simple and efficient manner.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
The main thing i like about it is the ease of use. It enhances productivity and while having to spend less amount of money. It helps you decrease the time spent so you can use it for anything other productive and It is the best platform that I have seen so far. You can integrate it to social tools as well and it provides a simple and efficient solution.Tons of features present at one single platform  and The support system is caring and friendly as they respond to your concerns within no time and solve them too. It is a software that works together with your website  and helps your email to get integrated.  Everything is prepared for you and it does all the work for you.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
The learning curve of Webmecanik Automation is steep and it can take some time to learn it properly. There are not much complaints i have from this software. Minor bugs are found but they are present in every system to it is not a big deal.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is a marketing automation platform that saves the time and money of your company. all_reviews.review_title: Popular open-source solution with excellent support by webmecanik
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
You get a complete Mautic installation. Everything already setup and ready to go. Webmecaniks support is brilliant, fast and not limited to technical problems only. They also offer great support in all questions and problems regarding marketing automation in general.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
Nothing so far. I think it is important to mention that webmecanik offers mautic as a service. So you may not be able to control every server-side setting. But in all honesty you don't have to because that is what webmecanik does.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation provides you with great tools to plan and realise automated marketing campaigns. With automation it is possible to design campaigns tailored to the needs of different potential customer segments.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
review_question_answers.answer: You get a complete Mautic installation. Everything already setup and ready to go. Webmecaniks support is brilliant, fast and not limited to technical problems only. They also offer great support in all questions and problems regarding marketing automation in general.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
review_question_answers.answer: Nothing so far. I think it is important to mention that webmecanik offers mautic as a service. So you may not be able to control every server-side setting. But in all honesty you don't have to because that is what webmecanik does.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Automation provides you with great tools to plan and realise automated marketing campaigns. With automation it is possible to design campaigns tailored to the needs of different potential customer segments.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy Marketing Automation for SMB based on open source
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Webmecanik Automation?
Webmecanik is simple to setup and easy to use. It is based on the open source Marketing Automation platform Mautic. It is perfect for companies willing to implement a marketing automation software which works together with their current website (eg. on Wordpress). Powerful email integration with Mailjet.

What do you dislike about Webmecanik Automation?
Social Media integration is just being added to Webmecanik. We need it and wait for it.

What problems is Webmecanik Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Webmecanik developed the "MyWebmecanik" platform allowing agencies to run several clients at one place  (Agency Platform).

It is perfect for companies willing to implement a marketing automation software which works together with their current website (eg. on Wordpress). Powerful email integration with Mailjet.

review_question_answers.answer: Webmecanik developed the "MyWebmecanik" platform allowing agencies to run several clients at one place  (Agency Platform).
